metadata.title: New Body Line 2 - A Family Where the Common Goal is to Improve
metadata.description: Gym in Cavallino-Treporti with expert staff, fitness and dance courses, and a welcoming environment for your wellbeing.

hero.title: A Family Where
hero.titleAccent: the Common Goal is to Improve
hero.description: At New Body Line 2 you will find trained staff ready to guide you on whatever path you choose, helping you understand the importance of fitness and personal wellbeing.

features.title: About Us
features.subtitle: Welcome to your gym in Cavallino-Treporti!

equipment.title: More Than a Gym
equipment.description: Located at Via Grisolera 33, a place where health, wellbeing and passion for movement come together.

trainers.title: Welcoming Environment
trainers.description: A professional and dynamic environment, designed to help you reach your personal goals.

atmosphere.title: A Community
atmosphere.description: A staff always ready to welcome you with a smile: your progress is our top priority.

hours.title: Your Wellbeing
hours.description: Every detail is designed for your wellbeing. Come visit us, we're waiting for you!

courses.title: Our Courses
courses.subtitle: All courses are designed to fit your needs and goals! Discover our wide range and join the path that's right for you.
courses.danceSubtitle: Discover your passion for dance: our courses are waiting for you! Our two dance studios are ready just for you!

pilates.title: Pilates
pilates.description: Rediscover balance, strength and flexibility with Pilates, a workout that unites body and mind through controlled and precise movements. Ideal for improving posture and muscle tone.

kickboxing.title: Kickboxing
kickboxing.description: Release stress and improve endurance, strength and coordination in a dynamic course combining boxing and martial arts techniques. Also available for kids: a fun and safe activity teaching discipline and self-control.

circuit.title: Circuit Training
circuit.description: Get a full workout with our circuits, combining aerobic and resistance exercises to improve strength, speed and agility.

lowImpact.title: Low Impact Structural Circuit
lowImpact.description: A gentle but effective path, designed for those who want to train without overloading their joints. Perfect for recovery or for those who prefer a less intense approach.

spinning.title: Spinning
spinning.description: Hop on the saddle and pedal your way to peak fitness! Our spinning sessions suit all levels, improving cardiovascular endurance and burning calories.

posturale.title: Postural Gymnastics
posturale.description: Take care of your body with targeted exercises to correct posture, improve balance and relieve muscle tension. Ideal for those suffering from chronic pain or wanting to prevent future issues.

propedeutica.title: Dance Basics
propedeutica.description: The perfect introduction for the little ones: a playful and educational experience that develops coordination, musicality and love for dance.

modernDance.title: Modern Dance
modernDance.description: For those who want to move to the rhythm of the latest trends: technique and creativity blend into dynamic and engaging choreographies.

hipHop.title: Hip-Hop
hipHop.description: Unleash your energy and style! Our course will immerse you in urban culture, teaching you spectacular and unique moves.

choreography.title: Choreography Workshop
choreography.description: Collaborate in creating unique choreographies, expressing your personality and improving your expressive and artistic abilities.

courses.ctaDescription: Join New Body Line 2 today and discover our wide range of fitness and dance courses guided by qualified instructors.

pilates.longDescription: The Pilates method, developed by Joseph Pilates in the early 20th century, is a training system focused on body control, mindful breathing, and postural alignment. At New Body Line 2, our certified instructors guide you through exercise sequences that strengthen your core, improve flexibility, and develop deep body awareness. Each session adapts to your level, from complete beginner to experienced athlete.
pilates.benefit1Desc: Correct postural imbalances and develop natural body alignment through targeted exercises
pilates.benefit2Desc: Strengthen the deep muscles of the abdomen and back for superior stability
pilates.benefit3Desc: Progressively increase range of motion and muscular elasticity safely
pilates.benefit4Desc: Controlled breathing and mental focus reduce anxiety and accumulated tension
pilates.targetAudience: Suitable for everyone, from beginners to experienced athletes. Especially recommended for office workers, those with back pain, or anyone seeking a holistic approach to wellness.
pilates.whatToExpect: Each class begins with a targeted warm-up and mindful breathing, continues with bodyweight or small equipment exercises, and concludes with stretching and deep relaxation.
pilates.equipment: Comfortable, fitted clothing and non-slip socks. Mats and equipment provided by the gym.

kickboxing.longDescription: Kickboxing is a discipline that combines boxing and martial arts techniques into a complete high-intensity workout. In our course, you'll learn punch, kick, and defensive combinations in a safe and stimulating environment. Also available for kids, where young ones learn discipline, self-control, and coordination through fun, safe activities.
kickboxing.benefit1Desc: Improve aerobic capacity and cardiovascular system efficiency
kickboxing.benefit2Desc: Develop muscular power through dynamic punch and kick combinations
kickboxing.benefit3Desc: Sharpen reflexes and hand-eye coordination with ever-changing sequences
kickboxing.benefit4Desc: Release accumulated stress and tension in an energetic, motivating environment
kickboxing.targetAudience: Suitable for adults and children of all ages. Perfect for those seeking a complete workout, wanting to learn self-defense, or simply looking to relieve stress.
kickboxing.whatToExpect: Dynamic warm-up, technical instruction for punches and kicks, bag work and partner drills, and cool-down with final stretching.
kickboxing.equipment: Athletic clothing and sneakers. Gloves and protective gear available at the gym.

circuit.longDescription: Circuit Training is a high-intensity method combining stations of aerobic and resistance exercises in rapid succession. Our circuits maximize muscular and cardiovascular work in minimal time, offering a complete and efficient workout. Every session is different, keeping motivation high.
circuit.benefit1Desc: Work all major muscle groups in a single efficient and balanced session
circuit.benefit2Desc: High intensity stimulates your basal metabolic rate for hours after the workout
circuit.benefit3Desc: Simultaneously improve muscular strength and cardiovascular endurance
circuit.benefit4Desc: Ever-changing circuits prevent monotony and drive consistent progress
circuit.targetAudience: Recommended for those with an existing fitness base who want to take their training to the next level. Suitable for intermediate and advanced athletes.
circuit.whatToExpect: Timed stations alternating strength, cardio, and functional exercises. Brief active rest between stations and final cool-down.
circuit.equipment: Athletic clothing and sneakers. All circuit equipment is provided.

lowImpact.longDescription: The Low Impact Structural Circuit is a gentle yet effective training program for those who want to stay fit without excessive joint stress. Ideal for post-injury recovery, those over 50, or anyone who prefers a gradual, body-respectful approach.
lowImpact.benefit1Desc: Low-impact exercises that respect joints and minimize the risk of injury
lowImpact.benefit2Desc: Perfect for post-injury rehabilitation and gradual return to physical activity
lowImpact.benefit3Desc: Strengthen and tone muscles with controlled, progressive movements
lowImpact.benefit4Desc: Suitable for all fitness levels and every age group
lowImpact.targetAudience: Ideal for beginners, people over 50, those recovering from injury, or anyone who prefers a low-impact workout.
lowImpact.whatToExpect: Circuit with bodyweight and small equipment stations, moderate pace, focus on proper technique, and adequate rest periods.
lowImpact.equipment: Comfortable clothing, supportive sneakers. Equipment provided by the gym.

spinning.longDescription: Spinning is an immersive indoor cycling experience combining energizing music, atmospheric lighting, and motivating guidance from our instructors. Sessions adapt to all levels — adjust your bike's resistance for a tailored workout. A fun and social way to burn calories and improve endurance.
spinning.benefit1Desc: Significantly improve cardiovascular health and increase lung capacity
spinning.benefit2Desc: A session can burn up to 500-700 calories thanks to the workout intensity
spinning.benefit3Desc: Strengthen quads, glutes, and calves with variable-resistance pedaling
spinning.benefit4Desc: Group energy and electrifying music make every session a unique experience
spinning.targetAudience: Open to all levels. Perfect for those who love group training, seek effective cardio, or want a fun alternative to running.
spinning.whatToExpect: Instructor-led pedaling with rhythm and resistance variations, accompanied by high-energy music. Gradual warm-up, intense main phase, and cool-down.
spinning.equipment: Athletic clothing, towel, and water bottle. Bikes and clip-in shoes are provided.

posturale.longDescription: Postural Gymnastics is a program of specific exercises aimed at correcting posture, relieving chronic muscle tension, and preventing spinal issues. Our instructors guide you through gentle, targeted movements with special attention to breathing and body awareness.
posturale.benefit1Desc: Retrain your body to maintain proper positions in daily life and during exercise
posturale.benefit2Desc: Naturally relieve back pain, neck pain, and chronic muscle tension
posturale.benefit3Desc: Strengthen stabilizer muscles for improved balance and overall coordination
posturale.benefit4Desc: Prevent future musculoskeletal issues through targeted preventive work
posturale.targetAudience: Recommended for those with back pain, neck pain, sedentary lifestyles, or anyone wanting to improve their posture and prevent problems.
posturale.whatToExpect: Joint mobility exercises, active stretching, postural muscle strengthening, diaphragmatic breathing work, and final relaxation.
posturale.equipment: Comfortable, fitted clothing. Mats provided by the gym.

propedeutica.longDescription: Dance Basics is a program for children aged 3 to 6, introducing them to dance through play, music, and free movement. In a welcoming, safe environment, little ones develop motor coordination, sense of rhythm, and creativity — the foundation for any future dance discipline.
propedeutica.benefit1Desc: Develop fundamental motor skills through structured games and exercises
propedeutica.benefit2Desc: Learn musical listening and sense of rhythm through engaging playful activities
propedeutica.benefit3Desc: Encourage interaction with peers and develop social skills
propedeutica.benefit4Desc: Stimulate creativity and personal expression through free movement
propedeutica.targetAudience: Dedicated to children aged 3 to 6. A playful, educational program ideal as a first introduction to dance and music.
propedeutica.whatToExpect: Movement games, rhythm-based coordination exercises, playful mini-choreographies, and moments of free expression in a safe, colorful environment.
propedeutica.equipment: Comfortable clothing, non-slip socks or dance shoes. Teaching materials are provided.

modernDance.longDescription: Modern Dance blends classical and contemporary technique, offering a rich, dynamic expressive language. Our courses explore different styles and choreographic techniques, developing technical, artistic, and interpretive skills. Our dance studios are fully equipped for the best experience.
modernDance.benefit1Desc: Acquire a solid technical foundation spanning classical to contemporary dance
modernDance.benefit2Desc: Learn to communicate emotions and tell stories through body language
modernDance.benefit3Desc: Improve elasticity and range of motion with specific training
modernDance.benefit4Desc: Develop your unique style by merging technique and personal interpretation
modernDance.targetAudience: Open to teens and adults of all levels. Ideal for those who love expressing themselves through movement and want to explore contemporary dance.
modernDance.whatToExpect: Technical warm-up, center and space exercises, choreographic sequence study, guided improvisation, and expressive work.
modernDance.equipment: Fitted clothing, bare feet or dance socks. Dance studios with mirrors and professional flooring.

hipHop.longDescription: Hip-Hop is much more than a dance style — it's a culture, an attitude, a way of expressing yourself. Our course immerses you in urban dance, teaching the fundamentals of the most iconic styles. From street dance to freestyle, every class is a journey into hip-hop energy and creativity.
hipHop.benefit1Desc: Develop a deep connection with music and beat, fundamental for hip-hop
hipHop.benefit2Desc: Find and develop your artistic identity and unique way of moving
hipHop.benefit3Desc: Improve endurance, agility, and strength through dynamic, explosive movements
hipHop.benefit4Desc: Join a vibrant community and share your passion for urban dance
hipHop.targetAudience: For teens and adults who love urban music, want to express themselves through movement, or seek a fun and engaging workout.
hipHop.whatToExpect: Energetic warm-up, hip-hop fundamentals study, choreographic sequences to current tracks, freestyle moments, and group cyphers.
hipHop.equipment: Comfortable, loose clothing, flat-soled sneakers. Bring water and a towel.

choreography.longDescription: The Choreography Workshop is a creative space where participants collaborate in creating original choreographic pieces. Under our choreographers' guidance, explore composition techniques, structured improvisation, and stage work, developing your performance and artistic abilities.
choreography.benefit1Desc: Develop your ability to create and compose original choreographic sequences
choreography.benefit2Desc: Collaborate with other dancers to create harmonious and engaging group pieces
choreography.benefit3Desc: Improve your stage presence and artistic interpretation in front of an audience
choreography.benefit4Desc: Find your artistic voice and learn to communicate through choreography
choreography.targetAudience: For intermediate and advanced dancers who want to explore choreographic creation and develop their performance abilities.
choreography.whatToExpect: Guided creative exploration, improvisation exercises, small-group choreographic composition, rehearsal and refinement, constructive feedback.
choreography.equipment: Fitted, comfortable clothing, bare feet or dance shoes depending on style. Studios with mirrors and sound system.

personalTraining.title: Personal Training
personalTraining.subtitle: Work one-on-one with our elite trainers to achieve your fitness goals faster
personalTraining.heroDescription: Get personalized attention, customized workout plans, and dedicated support from our certified personal trainers.

trainers.title: Meet Our Expert Trainers
trainers.subtitle: Choose the perfect trainer for your goals

booking.successToast: Your session has been booked successfully!
booking.trainerOnVacationDesc: This trainer is not available on the selected date. Please choose another date.

customized.title: Customized Plans
customized.description: Workouts tailored specifically to your goals and fitness level

accountability.title: Accountability
accountability.description: Stay motivated with a dedicated trainer pushing you to succeed

faster.title: Faster Results
faster.description: Achieve your goals more efficiently with expert guidance

technique.title: Proper Technique
technique.description: Learn correct form to maximize results and prevent injury

location.subtitle: Find our address, opening hours and directions to plan your visit
location.ctaDescription: Come experience our state-of-the-art facility and meet our team. Your first session is on us!

manage.cancelled: Your booking has been cancelled successfully.
